# Plan Statistics

Snapshot of the planning state and roadmap for OBS Remote Control (updated: 2026-01-13).

## Plan Health
- **Planning phase**: ✅ Complete (see [PROJECT_STATUS.md](../PROJECT_STATUS.md))
- **Implementation**: ✅ Complete
- **Documentation coverage**: 6 primary files (`README.md`, `USAGE.md`, `DESIGN.md`, `VISUAL_GUIDE.md`, `IMPLEMENTATION.md`, `PROJECT_STATUS.md`)
- **Build targets**: Windows & Linux configured via `electron-builder`

## Roadmap Metrics
- Enhancement roadmap metrics (core 1.0 release is already complete).
- **Total roadmap items**: 10
- **Completed (enhancements)**: 0
- **In progress**: 0
- **Planned / not started**: 10
- All 10 roadmap items from `README.md` are listed in the table below.

| Roadmap Item | Status | Notes |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Keyboard shortcuts | Planned | Future usability boost |
| Custom hotkeys | Planned | Complement shortcuts |
| Multi-OBS connection support | Planned | Manage multiple hosts |
| Recording playback integration | Planned | Review recordings in-app |
| Advanced source controls | Planned | Deeper source management |
| Themes support | Planned | Light/dark and custom themes |
| Multiple language support | Planned | Localization backlog |
| Video preview (if WebSocket supports it) | Planned | Blocked by OBS WebSocket capabilities |
| Scene collection management | Planned | Manage scene collections remotely |
| Profile switching | Planned | Quick profile changes |

## Next Planning Checkpoints
- Prioritize keyboard shortcuts and multi-OBS support for the next iteration.
- Track OBS WebSocket updates to unlock real video preview.
- Revisit localization and theming once core roadmap items progress.
